metrics: Количество клиентов, посещавших МП

querys.query: SELECT DISTINCT (number) AS value FROM logs.full_add_cart WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list}

metrics: Количество клиентов, оформивших заказ

querys.query: SELECT DISTINCT (number) as value FROM Loyalty03..Orders_header WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE date_order between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND source IN (2, 3, 4, 5) AND id_status in (5, 9, 18) AND order_type in (2, 4)

metrics: Количество уникальных корзин за период

querys.query: SELECT DISTINCT (id_cart) as value FROM logs.full_add_cart WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list}

metrics: Количество добавленных товаров из всех мест МП (поиск, каталог, подборки и др.)

querys.query: SELECT DISTINCT (id_tov) as value FROM logs.full_add_cart WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND isNotNull(id_tov) AND id_element IN ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit')

metrics: Выручка добавленных товаров из всех мест МП (поиск, каталог, подборки и др.)

querys.query: SELECT sum(Order_line.base_sum) as value FROM Loyalty03..Orders_header as Orders_header (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Loyalty03..Order_line AS Order_line (NOLOCK) ON Order_line.id_order = Orders_header.id_order WHERE Orders_header.date_order between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND source IN (2, 3, 4, 5) AND id_status in (5, 9, 18) AND order_type in (2, 4) AND number in {number_list}

metrics: Маржа добавленных товаров из всех мест МП (поиск, каталог, подборки и др.)

querys.query: SELECT sum(Order_line.base_sum - Order_line.quantity * Sebest_tov_tbl.Sebestoimost_nds) as value FROM Loyalty03..Orders_header as Orders_header (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Loyalty03..Order_line AS Order_line (NOLOCK) ON Order_line.id_order = Orders_header.id_order INNER JOIN NSI..Sebest_tov_tbl AS Sebest_tov_tbl (NOLOCK) ON Sebest_tov_tbl.Tovar_Id = Order_line.id_tov AND CAST(Sebest_tov_tbl._Period AS date) = CAST(FORMAT(Orders_header.date_order, 'yyyy-MM-01') AS date) WHERE Orders_header.date_order between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND source IN (2, 3, 4, 5) AND id_status in (5, 9, 18) AND order_type in (2, 4) AND number in {number_list}

metrics: Количество клиентов, заходивших в поиск

querys.query: SELECT DISTINCT (number) as value  FROM (SELECT number   as number  FROM logs.tovs_search  WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list})

metrics: Количество клиентов, добавлявших товары из непустого поиска

querys.query: SELECT DISTINCT (number) as value  FROM (SELECT number   as number  FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND search_bar != '' AND id_element IN ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit'))

metrics: Количество уникальных выдач (не пустых)

querys.query: SELECT DISTINCT (id_search) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND search_bar != ''

metrics: Количество разных запросов

querys.query: SELECT DISTINCT (search_bar) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list}

metrics: Количество уникальных выдач с добавлением (не пустых)

querys.query: SELECT DISTINCT (id_search) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit') AND search_bar != ''

metrics: Количество товаров добавленных из поиска (не пустого)

querys.query: SELECT COUNT(id_tov) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit') AND search_bar != ''

metrics: Выручка товаров добавленных из поиска (не пустого)

querys.query: SELECT id_cart, id_tov FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit') AND search_bar != ''

SELECT sum(Order_line.base_sum) as value FROM Loyalty03..Orders_header as Orders_header INNER JOIN Loyalty03..Order_line AS Order_line ON Order_line.id_order = Orders_header.id_order AND Order_line.id_tov in {id_tov} WHERE Orders_header.date_order between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND source IN (2, 3, 4, 5) AND id_status in (5, 9, 18) AND order_type in (2, 4) AND Orders_header.id_cart in {id_cart}

metrics: Маржа товаров добавленных из поиска (не пустого)

querys.query: SELECT id_cart, id_tov FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit') AND search_bar != ''

SELECT sum(Order_line.base_sum - Order_line.quantity * Sebest_tov_tbl.Sebestoimost_nds) as value FROM Loyalty03..Orders_header as Orders_header (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Loyalty03..Order_line AS Order_line (NOLOCK) ON Order_line.id_order = Orders_header.id_order AND Order_line.id_tov in {id_tov} INNER JOIN NSI..Sebest_tov_tbl AS Sebest_tov_tbl (NOLOCK) ON Sebest_tov_tbl.Tovar_Id = Order_line.id_tov AND CAST(Sebest_tov_tbl._Period AS date) = CAST(FORMAT(Orders_header.date_order, 'yyyy-MM-01') AS date) AND Sebest_tov_tbl.Tovar_Id in {id_tov} WHERE Orders_header.date_order between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND source IN (2, 3, 4, 5) AND id_status in (5, 9, 18) AND order_type in (2, 4) AND Orders_header.id_cart in {id_cart}

metrics: Количество выдач пустого поиска (рекомендации в пустом поиске)

querys.query: SELECT COUNT(id_search) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND search_bar = '' AND id_element in ('start', 'restart')

metrics: Количество выдач пустого поиска (рекомендации в пустом поиске) с добавлением

querys.query: SELECT COUNT(id_search) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND search_bar = '' AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit')

metrics: Количество товаров, добавленных из пустого поиска

querys.query: SELECT COUNT(id_tov) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit') AND search_bar = ''

metrics: Количество разных запросов без добавления (ни одного добавления за период)

querys.query: WITH ss as (SELECT uniqExact(search_bar) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list})SELECT (select sss from ss) - uniqExact(search_bar) as search_bar FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit')

metrics: Количество выдач 'Ничего не найдено'

querys.query: SELECT COUNT(id_search) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND id_element in ('restart') AND rn_max = 0

metrics: Количество запросов 'Ничего не найдено'

querys.query: SELECT COUNT(search_bar) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND id_element in ('restart') AND rn_max = 0

metrics: Количество выдач с интересом: любое действие: добавление, просмотр карточки товара, привозите больше, избранное, списки

querys.query: SELECT COUNT(id_search) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit')

metrics: Средняя позиция добавления

querys.query: SELECT position as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND position > 0 AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit')

metrics: Количество запросов со средней позицией добавления более 6

querys.query: SELECT COUNT(search_bar) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND position > 6 AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit')

metrics: Количество запросов со средней позицией добавления более 12

querys.query: SELECT COUNT(search_bar) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND position > 12 AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit')

metrics: Количество запросов со средней позицией добавления более 40

querys.query: SELECT COUNT(search_bar) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND position > 40 AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit')

metrics: Количество уникальных выдач с позицией добавления более 6

querys.query: SELECT DISTINCT (id_search) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND position > 6 AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit')

metrics: Количество уникальных выдач с позицией добавления более 12

querys.query: SELECT DISTINCT (id_search) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND position > 12 AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit')

metrics: Количество уникальных выдач с позицией добавления более 40

querys.query: SELECT DISTINCT (id_search) as value FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND position > 40 AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit')

metrics: Среднее время от запроса до добавления

querys.query: WITH min_search AS (SELECT min(date_add) as min_d,  id_search as id_search FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND id_element in ('add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit') GROUP BY id_search), min_add as (SELECT min(date_add) as min_d, id_search as id_search FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND id_element in ('add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit') GROUP BY id_search, id_tov) SELECT date_diff('second', min_search.min_d, min_add.min_d) as value FROM min_search INNER JOIN min_add USING(id_search)

metrics: Количество поисковых сессий (Уточнение запроса или исправления ошибки - единая поисковая сессия)

querys.query: SELECT number, id_search FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} GROUP BY number, id_search

metrics: Количество сессий без добавления

querys.query: SELECT number, id_search FROM logs.tovs_search WHERE date_add between '{date_1}' and '{date_2}' AND number in {number_list} AND id_element in ( 'add', 'plus', 'minus', 'edit') GROUP BY number, id_search
